trends: There have been 76 other sightings in Calgary
There was one other sighting in Calgary on or around July 24th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 fly in a military stunt jet an keep perfect formation till they disappear at light speed
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving to go Camping to Banff I had just stepped out my front door an walked to my car when my mother noticed stunt jets... it didn't take long to realize they weren't jets or air planes but birds flying like military planes in formation (Triangular) the whole time. I started recording their flight and did till the top bird I was zoomed on disappeared. the video reveals it descintigrated and jumped at light speed. It strongly suggests it took off at light speed by seeing the red spectrum addherent to space objects moving away from us at the speed of light or faster. This report is a more broken down analysis of the original recording video. You can find more spirit reality at youtube channel MrDanBunes.
